name: Trick or Treat - HackUTD Game Jam
name_original: Trick or Treat - HackUTD Game Jam
description:
Which will it be - trick or treat?

Play through our 6 unique minigames that involve either "trick" or "treat" to help celebrate the Halloween spirit this year!

Halloween Trivia

Cat in the Hat

DoorDash

Ghostbusters

Yummy Yummy Gummy

Pinata

Software:

  • Blender
  • Autodesk Maya
  • Substance Painter
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Unity
  • GitKraken
